name: Ballou Skies Aviation
about: Ballou Skies Aviation, located at the Port Bucyrus/Crawford County Airport (17G) in Bucyrus, Ohio, is a private flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and economical flight training. We offer programs ranging from the first flight to Certified Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII) in single-engine aircraft. Our approach is tailored to accommodate individuals with busy schedules, ensuring that those with real-world commitments can pursue their aviation goals. With a focus on practical and efficient training, Ballou Skies Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their flying aspirations while balancing their everyday lives. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality instruction and support to ensure our students become proficient and safe pilots.
